lines.text: I'll have a Harvey Wallbanger. Make it a Harvey Oswald.
What's the difference?
Oswald has three shots.
This is the black tie affair!
I know, sir and I got it covered. I'm black and I'm wearing a tie.
What are you doing?
I'm doing my job, keepin' you alive, I'm testing your food.
But why do you always test my cookies?
The kitchen's closed.
I'm Agent Double-Oh Simms. I can get into any kitchen.
Luke! Say did you see the kid come out here?
Yes, Sir.
Then why didn't you stop him?
He lives here.
Don't just stand there. Say "Hello".
HELLO!
Yeah, just make the girl go deaf. They love that.
And lose that tie. You look like you robbed a dead clown.
It sure would be a shame if I told my dad about you taking me boxing.
It would be a shame if I threw you out that window too.
Just be careful out there in cyberspace. Don't tell them anything.
Online I'm a normal kid, just like everybody else.

[Quietly]
You ought to try that here.
What?
I said, "Go to bed". And be careful out there in cyber space. Be careful what you tell people.
Okay! And stop telling me what to do. You're not my father.

[Quietly]
Lucky for me.
What?
Nice PJs. They got feet on them, don't they?
You're in high school now, and I expect you to act like it.
Then don't dress me in these dorky clothes.
You're not dressed in dorky clothes, you're in nice clothes. You look very handsome. You should consider yourself lucky.
I should consider myself dorky.
He spanked you like a four year old at K-Mart.
You guys suck.
We suck, ya hear that Luke? We suck, alright, we suck! Let's make a sucky left turn here.
I ain't skated since I was a kid, and *back then* I had a pizza face. Now I got a great big pizza face!
I'm gonna be watching you, Simms, and the minute you screw up you're gonna be working mail fraud in east Cleveland. You understand me? OR AM I YELLING AT TOO HIGH A FREQUENCY?
No, Sir, I got my ear piece in.

[Dressed as a giant Coca Cola cup and pizza]
I have a head ache THIS big. I have been punched in the stomach and kicked in the meatballs and we are going home!
Sir, here's that explosive coffee. Two sugars.
But we go boxing. I could go as Reggie!
You could go as Michael Jordan, but you ain't going.
I only get to see my parents on the news.
No, that's your "boo-tay" you've been seeing on the news.

You know what's gonna happen if I let you go? Morton is gonna call me in. Then he's going to chew my butt off. I'll be sitting there and my butt's gonna get smaller and smaller and by the time I get up, my back is going to be on my thighs. Because I won't have no butt. You wouldn't want that to happen to me, would you? Of course you wouldn't.
